description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

0.1.1.description:
- New Item Category "Side Quest Vivosaur"
- Includes Nigo, Peloro, Coelo, Gaudry, Desmo, Parapu, and Menchi
- This makes it easier to see if you have the necessary vivosaurs for the Show and Tell side quests and the Ryne's Request side quest and which ones you're missing.

- Provide an example yaml file for easier setup

- Fix "Fossil Lawn - Item 5" check not existing
- Fix Edapho being listed in an item category with no name
- Renamed "Mask Lady - Equip Completionist Mask" to "Mask Lady - Completionist Mask" to be more in line with other Mask Lady Checks
0.1.1.title: Fossil Fighters Champions Manual for Archipelago version 0.1.1
